short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attachment Metadata Removal for Gmail that cleans metadata from Microsoft Office and Adobe PDF attachments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Okatee cleans sensitive metadata from Gmail attachments.

How it works:
1. Integrates directly into the Gmail compose pane.
2. Select files to clean with the "Clean and Attach" button.
